T02D3489:137b-1: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3489:137b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3489:137b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3489:137b-5: sngags pas dang por zhig rang gi snying gar aa
T02D3489:137b-6: yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3489:137b-7: / de la gnas pa'i t'am yig kha dog ser po'o //
T02D3489:137b-8: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa /
T02D3489:137b-9: de'i lte ba la t'am yig bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3489:137b-10: de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin gdan drang par bya ste /
T02D3489:137b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'chad par 'gyur pa'i phyag mtshan la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3489:137b-13: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ;
T02D3489:137b-14: lha mo bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
T02D3489:137b-16: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'thon nas me
T02D3489:137b-17: tog la sogs pa'i nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pas yang
T02D3489:137b-18: dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3489:137b-19: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3489:137b-20: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3489:137b-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3489:137b-22: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang /
T02D3489:137b-23: btang snyoms rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3489:137b-24: de nas chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyang dper
T02D3489:137b-25: na rmi lam lta bu rang bzhin med pa gdod
T02D3489:137b-26: ma nas ma skyes shing lhag par grol pa'i sngags
T02D3489:137b-28: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3489:137b-29: de nas byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran par bya ste /
T02D3489:137b-30: nam mkha' la ram yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3489:137b-31: de la h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D3489:137b-32: de'i 'od zer las yang dag par byung ba ji
T02D3489:137b-33: srid du 'dod pa rgya che ba'i 'od zer gyi
T02D3489:137b-34: dra ba 'phro pa'i rdo rje'i ra ba'o //
T02D3489:137b-35: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i rdo rje'i gur /
T02D3489:137b-37: phyi rol du mtshams bcing ba yang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3489:137b-38: de'i 'od zer gyis bgegs rnams bskrad nas gur gyi
T02D3489:137b-39: dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin chos 'byung ae yig
T02D3489:137b-40: gi rnam pa smad phra ba steng yangs pa dkar
T02D3489:137b-42: de'i dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la sna tshogs
T02D3489:137b-43: chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la gnas pa rdo rje
T02D3489:137b-44: rtse gsum pa / de'i 'khris khyab pa'i 'byung ba
T02D3489:137b-45: chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni yam yig yongs
T02D3489:137b-46: su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po
T02D3489:137b-47: zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa rtse mo gnyis la
T02D3489:138a-0: rtse gsum pa / g-yo @138a * // ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D3489:138a-1: de'i steng du ram yig las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil
T02D3489:138a-2: 'khor dmar po zur gsum pa zur rnams su ram
T02D3489:138a-4: de'i steng du bam yig las skyes pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po dril bus mtshan pa'o //
T02D3489:138a-5: de'i steng du lam yig las skyes pa'i dbang chen
T02D3489:138a-6: gyi dkyil 'khor ser po grub bzhi pa'i zur rnams
T02D3489:138a-7: su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D3489:138a-8: de'i rang bzhin rmi lam lta bur rnam par shes
T02D3489:138a-9: par byas nas khams gsum khyab pa'i stegs bu la
T02D3489:138a-10: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3489:138a-11: skyes pa'i yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D3489:138a-12: mdor bsdus pa'i gzugs thar pa'i grong khyer chen po
T02D3489:138a-13: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs rdo
T02D3489:138a-14: rje'i stegs bu'i dbus su rin po che sna tshogs
T02D3489:138a-15: pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa
T02D3489:138a-17: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D3489:138a-18: stegs bu bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3489:138a-20: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang dril bu dang /
T02D3489:138a-23: ba dan sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D3489:138a-24: dril bus rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3489:138a-25: de'i snying po'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D3489:138a-26: ge sar dang bcas pa'i ze'u 'bru'i steng du aa
T02D3489:138a-27: yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3489:138a-28: ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D3489:138a-29: no // de'i steng du t'am yig ser po nyi
T02D3489:138a-30: ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa ni mnyam pa nyid
T02D3489:138a-31: kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D3489:138a-32: de nas t'am yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo
T02D3489:138a-33: rje rtse dgu pa gser gyi mdog lta bu sa
T02D3489:138a-34: bon gyi snying po can ni so sor rtog pa'i
T02D3489:138a-35: rang bzhin no // de las byung ba'i 'od zer
T02D3489:138a-36: 'phro bas phyogs bcur bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnam pas
T02D3489:138a-37: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad nas slar yang
T02D3489:138a-38: de la de bzhin du rdo rje'i rtags la sdud
T02D3489:138a-39: pa ni bya ba grub pa'i rang bzhin nyid do
T02D3489:138a-40: rang bzhin no // // de nas sa bon gyi
T02D3489:138a-41: rtags dang zla ba dang nyi ma yongs su gyur
T02D3489:138a-42: pa las bcom ldan 'das ma ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D3489:138a-43: rnam par ngag pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje sgrol ma
T02D3489:138a-44: rang bzhin no // // ste / zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3489:138a-45: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3489:138a-48: gzhon nu ma'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D3489:138a-50: na tshod gzhon nu 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D3489:138a-51: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can /
T02D3489:138a-52: sangs rgyas bzhi'i cod pan can chen po padma r'a ga'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D3489:138b-0: phyag @138b g-yas na rdo rje dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3489:138b-3: de bzhin du g-yon na autpa la ser po dang /
T02D3489:138b-6: zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo /
T02D3489:138b-7: zhal dang po gser gyi mdog lta bu g-yas dkar po /
T02D3489:138b-10: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3489:138b-11: sngags pas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las yang
T02D3489:138b-12: dag par byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag po'i zhal nas
T02D3489:138b-13: phyung ste / lha mo bcu po rnams kyi dbye pa t'am gi sa bon las byung ba /
T02D3489:138b-14: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3489:138b-15: shar la sogs pa phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la
T02D3489:138b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom t'a re
T02D3489:138b-17: tu re'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D3489:138b-18: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi sgo rnams la nyi
T02D3489:138b-19: ma la gnas pa'i t'a re tu re'i yi ge
T02D3489:138b-20: rnams so // steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sv'a yig go //
T02D3489:138b-21: 'og tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h'a yig go //
T02D3489:138b-22: de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams yongs su gyur
T02D3489:138b-23: pa las mtshan ma bon gyi snying po can bsgoms
T02D3489:138b-24: nas // de'i 'od zer gyis spro ba dang /
T02D3489:138b-25: bsdu ba byas nas de'i sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur pa las lha mo rnams te /
T02D3489:138b-26: lha mo bcu ni sa bcu yi //
T02D3489:138b-27: rang bzhin nyid du shes par bya //
T02D3489:138b-28: rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor ma //
T02D3489:138b-29: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02D3489:138b-30: shar sbor sgrol ma sku mdog dkar //
T02D3489:138b-31: zla ba la gnas rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3489:138b-32: phyag na me tog phreng ba bsnams //
T02D3489:138b-33: aom yig las byung bsgom par bya //
T02D3489:138b-34: lho phyogs bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
T02D3489:138b-35: zla la t'am yig las byung gnag / phyag na spos kyi sdong bu bsnams //
T02D3489:138b-36: rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D3489:138b-37: nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02D3489:138b-38: sku mdog ser mo legs par brgyan //
T02D3489:138b-39: mar me'i sdong bu phyag na bsnams //
T02D3489:138b-40: zla ba re yig las byung ma //
T02D3489:138b-41: byang du de bzhin dri'i sgrol ma //
T02D3489:138b-42: zla ba tu yig las byung ma //
T02D3489:138b-43: phyag na dri yi dung chos bsnams //
T02D3489:138b-44: sku mdog dmar mo legs par brgyan //
T02D3489:138b-45: mi bskyod la sogs dbye ba yi //
T02D3489:138b-46: rdo rje 'khor lo de bzhin du //
T02D3489:138b-47: pang du de yi kha dog dbye //
T02D3489:138b-48: de nas sgo skyong ma rnams bsgom //
T02D3489:138b-49: nyi ma la gnas rgyan kun ldan //
T02D3489:138b-50: shar gyi sgo ru lcags kyu ma //
T02D3489:138b-51: tt'a yig sa bon las byung dkar //
T02D3489:138b-52: phyag g-yas na ni lcags kyu bsnams //
T02D3489:138b-53: g-yon pa bdud la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3489:138b-54: lho na zhags pa ser mo ste //
T02D3489:138b-55: re yig sa bon las byung ma//
T02D3489:139a-0: @139a * // zhags pa dang bcas sdigs mdzub phyag / dkyil 'khor dmar po la brten ma //
T02D3489:139a-1: nub tu lcags sgrog dmar mo ste //
T02D3489:139a-2: tu yig sa bon las byung ma //
T02D3489:139a-3: rdo rje phreng ba sdigs mdzub phyag //
T02D3489:139a-4: rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas ma //
T02D3489:139a-5: byang du ljang gu dril bu ma //
T02D3489:139a-6: re yig sa bon las byung ma //
T02D3489:139a-7: phyag na rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02D3489:139a-8: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub 'od la gnas //
T02D3489:139a-9: mtshams kyi cha la mtshan ma rnams //
T02D3489:139a-10: m'a ma k'i sogs rnam dag pa'i //
T02D3489:139a-11: byang chub sems kyi bum pa dang //
T02D3489:139a-12: ri rab me thab rgyal mtshan che //
T02D3489:139a-13: steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma //
T02D3489:139a-14: nyi ma sv'a yig las byung ma //
T02D3489:139a-15: dkar mo rdo rje dkar po bsnams //
T02D3489:139a-16: g-yon pa dgra la sdigs mdzub can //
T02D3489:139a-17: nyi ma h'a yig las byung ba'i //
T02D3489:139a-18: sngon mo sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3489:139a-19: phyag g-yon sdigs mdzub mi bzad ma //
T02D3489:139a-20: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma bsgom bya //
T02D3489:139a-21: mig sogs thams cad byin brlabs nas //
T02D3489:139a-22: gti mug rdo rje spyan la dgod //
T02D3489:139a-23: zhe sdang rdo rje snyan ngag la //
T02D3489:139a-24: shangs la de bzhin ser sna ste //
T02D3489:139a-25: zhal la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D3489:139a-26: sku la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D3489:139a-27: yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma //
T02D3489:139a-28: zhes pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par byas nas /
T02D3489:139a-29: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D3489:139a-30: aom yig gis sku byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3489:139a-31: a'a: yig gis gsung byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3489:139a-32: h'um yig gis thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3489:139a-33: de nas lha mo thams cad kyi thugs kar zla
T02D3489:139a-34: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rang rang gi sa
T02D3489:139a-36: de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gdan drangs te /
T02D3489:139a-37: me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D3489:139a-38: spros nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o
T02D3489:139a-39: // de nas ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3489:139a-40: sgo skyong ma rnams kyis rab tu sbyor bas dam
T02D3489:139a-41: tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gzhug par
T02D3489:139a-42: // bya'o // aom badzra aam ku sha a'a karsha
T02D3489:139a-43: ya dza: aom badzra p'a sha pra be sha ya
T02D3489:139a-44: // bya'o // h'um / aom badzra spho ta bandha ya bam /
T02D3489:139a-45: aom badzr'a be sha ba shim ku ru ho:de nas
T02D3489:139a-46: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od
T02D3489:139a-47: zer gyis khams gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
T02D3489:139a-48: gdan drangs nas yum rnams kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D3489:139a-49: nas rjes su mgon byed pa ste /
T02D3489:139a-50: aa bhi shinytsantu m'am sarba ta th'a ga ta buddha dzny'a ne na zhes so //
T02D3489:139b-0: @139b de nas sangs rgyas he ru ka'i gzugs kyis
T02D3489:139b-1: bdud rtsi lnga las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3489:139b-2: lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bum pa lngas dbang bskur nas
T02D3489:139b-3: / dbang bskur pa'i dus su me tog dang gur
T02D3489:139b-4: gum gyi char 'bab cing rnga bo che'i sgra la
T02D3489:139b-6: lha rnams kyis mchod cing bstod par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D3489:139b-7: dbang bskur bas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D3489:139b-8: snying po'i dbus su lha mo rnams kyi rim pa
T02D3489:139b-9: ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
T02D3489:139b-13: don yod grub pa rnams sgo skyong ma rnams la dbu rgyan du 'gyur ro //
T02D3489:139b-14: gtsug tor ma la rin chen dbang po'o ;
T02D3489:139b-15: / gnod mdzes la mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D3489:139b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sprul pa'i skus phyogs
T02D3489:139b-17: thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad
T02D3489:139b-18: par blta zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3489:139b-19: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3489:139b-20: sngags mchog 'di ni rab mchog ste //
T02D3489:139b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa ;
T02D3489:139b-22: / bklags pa yis ni dngos grub byed //
T02D3489:139b-23: gsal por rdo rje gur las gsungs //
T02D3489:139b-24: de nas gzungs sngags gzhan yang /
T02D3489:139b-25: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra ya bo dhi satv'a ya ma h'a satv'a ya /
T02D3489:139b-26: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D3489:139b-28: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'an pra
T02D3489:139b-29: dusht'an ma ma kri te dzam bha ya stam bha
T02D3489:139b-30: ya mo ha ya bandha ya h'um h'um h'um phat
T02D3489:139b-31: phat phat sarba dusht'an bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a
T02D3489:139b-32: / rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
